com.sun.identity.wss.provider.plugins

Class AgentProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.wss.provider.ProviderConfig
      • com.sun.identity.wss.provider.plugins.AgentProvider

  • public class AgentProvider
extends ProviderConfig
    This class AgentProvider extends from ProviderConfig to manage the web services server provider or the web services client configuration via Access Manager Agents.
